name: Mukki
desc: A new recruit in the flying squad of the Flower-Feather Clan.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a member of the flying squad, Mukki knows well that their strength in battle comes from mutual trust and seamless coordination with their Qucusaurs, a bond honed through countless hours of training. In the same way, achieving victory in Genius Invokation TCG requires equally rigorous "training."
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightnessâ€¦

customize.name: Fatui Pyro Agent
customize.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."

customize.name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage

...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
